mav_sim.chap5.compute_models module¶

compute_ss_model

  • Chapter 5 assignment for Beard & McLain, PUP, 2012

  • Update history:

    2/4/2019 - RWB 12/21 - GND

mav_sim.chap5.compute_models.compute_model(trim_state: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]], trim_input: MsgDelta) → None¶

TODO Document

Parameters:

  • trim_state – state of the trim trajectory

  • trim_input – inputs for the trim trajectory

mav_sim.chap5.compute_models.compute_ss_model(trim_state: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]], trim_input: MsgDelta) → tuple[ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]], ...]¶

Computes the state space model resulting from linearizing about the trim trajectory and input

Parameters:

  • trim_state – state of the trim trajectory

  • trim_input – inputs for the trim trajectory

Returns:

Longitudinal model defined in (5.51) (A_lat, B_lat): Lateral model defined in (5.44)

Return type:

(A_lon, B_lon)

mav_sim.chap5.compute_models.compute_tf_model(trim_state: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]], trim_input: MsgDelta) → tuple[float, float, float, float, float, float, float, float, float, float, float]¶

Compute the transfer function coefficients for the models in chapter 5.4

Parameters:

  • mav – dynamics of the mav

  • trim_state – state of the trim trajectory

  • trim_input – inputs for the trim trajectory

Returns:

Airspeed from the trim trajectory (assuming no wind) alpha_trim: Angle of attack as calculated from trim trajectory (assuming no wind) theta_trim: Pitch angle as calculated from the trim state

a_phi1, a_phi2: Coefficients for phi transfer function (defined in 5.23 -5.24)

a_theta1, a_theta2, a_theta3: Coefficients for the theta transfer function (defined prior to 5.29)

a_V1, a_V2, a_V3: Coefficients for the airspeed transfer function (defined prior to 5.37)

Return type:

Va_trim

mav_sim.chap5.compute_models.dT_dVa(Va: float, delta_t: float) → float¶

returns the numeric derivative of motor thrust with respect to Va

Parameters:

  • Va – Airspeed

  • delta_t – Throttle command

Returns:

numeric partial of motor thrust wrt Va

Return type:

dT_dVa

mav_sim.chap5.compute_models.dT_ddelta_t(Va: float, delta_t: float) → float¶

returns the numeric derivative of motor thrust with respect to delta_t

Parameters:

  • Va – Airspeed

  • delta_t – Throttle command

Returns:

numeric partial of motor thrust wrt delta_t

Return type:

dT_ddelta_t

mav_sim.chap5.compute_models.df_du(x_euler: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]], delta: MsgDelta) → ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]¶

take numeric partial of f_euler with respect to input

mav_sim.chap5.compute_models.df_dx(x_euler: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]], delta: MsgDelta) → ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]¶

take numeric partial of f_euler with respect to x_euler evaluated at (x_euler, delta)

mav_sim.chap5.compute_models.euler_state(x_quat: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]) → ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]¶

convert state x with attitude represented by quaternion to x_euler with attitude represented by Euler angles

mav_sim.chap5.compute_models.f_euler(x_euler: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]], delta: MsgDelta) → ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]¶

return 12x1 dynamics (as if state were Euler state) compute f at euler_state

mav_sim.chap5.compute_models.quaternion_state(x_euler: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]) → ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]¶

convert state x_euler with attitude represented by Euler angles to x_quat with attitude represented by quaternions
